description: Inserts a new permission set entry (e.g. basic store employee) for with given data.

parameters.name: permission_set
parameters.description: Properties of the new permission set.

name.description: Name of the new permission set.

description.description: Description of the new permission set.

permission_ids.description: Permission identifier list of the new permission set.

422.description: The supplied permission set parameters is invalid, the action is rolled back. *Refer to the body of the response.*
